review_title: Not sure I am getting any effect from it
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2024
review_body: The first time I used it (sublingual), I thought it worked and I was about as relaxed as a glass of red wine. But since then, whether I put it in a glass of fizzy water or under my tongue before TV (or bed) I haven't noticed much effect. The flavour is not bad at all: slightly sweet...slightly berry. And I have done a bit of research on all the ingredients. I would try another variety.The bottle is really heavy (quite nice). I will probably reuse it for something else. The packaging attractive. I need to try it for longer to be sure (using it now for two weeks) but for me it has helped decreasing alcohol consumption. It might for you too.

review_title: Keto-approved! It works and no extra carbs!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2018
review_body: I love this stuff. As a pediatric nurse, I take numerous measures to make sure I stay well and don’t bring any illnesses to my patients. One of those measures is a daily dose of high dose elderberry. I used to take Sambucus Immune, but I’ve recently started the keto diet and that particular liquid formula has 8 carbs per serving, so it’s a no go for me (but my daughter stays well on it)! This product is the highest strength I’ve found available in capsule form. I’ve been taking this product over 30 days and during that time, I’ve been in close quarters with several people with viruses like norovirus (stomach flu) and only once did I feel just a little queasy for one afternoon. I took a double dose that night and the next morning I felt at 100%. After that, I go ahead and double up when I’m knowingly around someone sick. Ultimately, I’m very pleased with this product and highly recommend it to anyone.

review_title: I recommend this to all my family and friends if they ...
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2015
review_body: Black elderberry from GAIA is the real thing. I recommend this to all my family and friends if they are getting sick. I take it every time I feel like I am "coming down with something" and within 24 hours I am completely better!  It is great to take daily to keep from getting sick during the winter when lots of viruses and such are going around. I even opened up the capsule and poured into some food for my 4 year old when she was sick with a bad cold and she felt better that same day. I 100% stand behind this product from GAIA.  It's also good for those with allergies and can help minimize symptoms if taken daily or reduce the need for allergy medicine.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2017
review_body: ** UPDATED FOR JUNE 2017, scroll down to read ** Bought twice. The first time I ordered a bottle I got Liquid Phyto-Capsules, the second time I ordered I recived capsules that seemed to either have powder in them or the liquid has dried up. The date on the bottle says 10/19, so I'm pretty sure they're not expired. I've been taking them like I normally would, but it's just...odd, because I know they're not supposed to look like this (unless they've changed?). I will still order these, I'm just confused. Hopefully I won't get sick or anything, I have 34 capsules left and I take two every morning.UPDATE: 6/12/17So I ordered another bottle a few days ago and received the bottle, to which on the box it stated that it was a new and improved formula. The capsules looked exactly like the ones that inspired me to write this review, they looked like the capsules in the picture. So the company finally got around to making it official that they changed the formula, on the box. I can't say for sure if this new formula works better than the old one, as I was sure that they were onto something with the liquid inside the capsule. Oh well. I ordered the elderberry syrup as well (not the nighttime one) and I take that sometimes when I need the extra help and want the benefits of having the liquid. So I guess just be aware that there's the change to the formula. Too bad they couldn't have just made another version of this capsule and kept this one with liquid inside. But I guess they know what they're doing.

review_title: recommended this to us two years ago and since then ...
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2015
review_body: My friend's twin sister, a midwife, recommended this to us two years ago and since then it's helped boost my immunity to every sniffle that comes around, and has made my allergies more manageable. I love this stuff. There's an increasing amount of scientific literature proving the efficacy of elderberry extract in immunity boosting. Amazon has the best prices on Gaia (60 for the price of 30 at Whole Foods), and the capsules are easy to swallow, whereas the syrup is very, very sweet and can be off putting. All of that being said, after six months of ordering it, I have to share this photo of the packaging to shame Amazon into a less wasteful shipping method. The box of capsules in a bubble wrap lined envelope would work just as well.

I like to think they do help keeping my immune system strong and in perfect working order.

review_body: I have an autoimmune disease called Sarcoidosis that affects my lungs.  I get a lot of mucus build up and non-stop episodes of coughing. I of course headed over to my favorite store (Amazon) and found the Gaia capsules, ordered a bottle to give them a try.  Wow!  They seem work almost instantaneously to break up the mucus and help to suppress the coughing.  I don't need to take them every day but I have reordered them twice and will continue to order to keep them in my cabinet.

Our delicious GaiaKids Black Elderberry Syrup is suitable for everyday use for the whole family. This popular formula is USDA Certified Organic and made with only organic black elderberries. Ideal for both daily and seasonal immune support, our Black Elderberry Syrup is a delicious and potent way to maintain your child's immune health all year long.
 Elderberries have been traditionally used for functions of the gastrointestinal tract, supporting a healthy body temperature and perspiration during an acute immune challenge, and for supporting the resilience of the body throughout the difficult winter months. Both elderflower and elderberry are rich in polyphenols, which have antioxidant activity. Oxidative stress is often produced during an immune response, and having sufficient antioxidant storage in the body may help to maintain the health and integrity of tissues.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2013
review_body: I give this to my 17 month old almost every day (very small dose), and it seems to keep her immune system strong. She thinks it is tasty and has had this and cod liver oil (orange/lemonade flavored) just about every day. She does not seem to get very sick, very often, though we do stay at home a lot. However, one week, we ran out of elderberry syrup, and she played at the mall one day and the library the next (they have a germ-filler toy kitchen haha) and of course, she came down with something the next day. As soon as I bought more elderberry syrup and gave it to her, she was almost instantly better (she was probably still fighting off the bug, but she felt and acted better).This is my holy grail!

review_title: Trying our best to boost his immune system
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2015
review_body: I can't quite speak to the efficacy of this yet since we started to give it to my toddler everyday as a preventative about two weeks ago. He has RAD (toddler asthma) and his trigger is a cold. Trying our best to boost his immune system. I did a lot of research on elderberry and this is the only brand I feel comfortable giving. It really is only elderberry and honey. Other brands include echinachea and while I am sure it works, I just don't want to give those mixtures to a toddler. He takes it in his morning almond milk like a champ so only time will tell if it works but from these reviews and others across the web, I am pretty confident and excited about it.

brand: BareOrganics Sweet Dreams Liquid Drops, Herbal Sleep Aid, 1 Ounce
name: BareOrganics Sweet Dreams Liquid Drops, Herbal Sleep Aid, 1 Ounce
description: Sweet Dreams Liquid Drops blend organic ingredients in an herbal sleep aid that help quiet the mind to support restful sleep. BareOrganics Sweet Dreams Drops are made with organic Valerian, Skullcap, Hops, Passion Flower, California Poppy and Chamomile for optimal wellness support. These liquid valerian drops are available in a compact vial and do not need to be refrigerated, making them ideal for those with active, on-the-go lifestyles. The BareOrganics Liquid Drops are developed without harsh chemicals or ingredients, and are proudly USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Kosher and Gluten & Alcohol-Free. This herbal supplement comes in a 1 ounce recyclable dropper bottle. The drops should be shaken before each use.

review_body: I have had trouble sleeping over the pandemic and so I keep adding sleep aids. This one works for me. It has all the right herbs in it. It doesn't have valerian and I appreciate that. Valerian has never put me to sleep like it does for other people, it is calming for daytime use but keeps me awake. This one has Passion Flower, California Poppy, Linden, Skullcap, and Hawthorn. After piling on the sleep enhancers, in my toolkit I have fish oil, magnesium, calcium, damiana and Natural Factors 3 Brains The Best-Sleep.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
review_body: Ive been on theses for a week. I was reluctant to use them. But my daughter who is in school for natural health. Explained the long term use bad effects of benadryl and melatonin.  And Ive been using benadryl for 2 plus years. I dont have a hard time going to sleep. My problem is staying asleep. And falling back to sleep once I wake up in the middle of the night. Well, i finally gave in and tried it. My daughter told me to give it a few weeks to build up in my system so it will help me sleep. Im sleeping! Wow, super surprised and happy im off the other sleep medication.  And crossing my fingers! I will update as time goes by.Con:Why not 5 stars???? Well, just as another reviewer stated . It gets stuck in the throat. Yes! It lodges in my esophagus and feels terrible.  I take huge gulps of water to try to force them down. Which could be scary for someone and could cause a blockage! So, beware of that FACT. As, for me im dealing with it. And do my best to swallow them. Im also not happy at the sudden jump in the cost. =( Hopefully thats to help fix their sticky capsule.  ....20 mins later, the capsule is still in my throat as im writing this. Maybe break open the capsule a pour it in a hot tea? 🤔

review_title: Personal opinion - too mild for me
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
review_body: My daughter swears by this stuff.  She told me to give it a week before deciding on its effectiveness.  The thing is - I have a pretty bad sleep disorder and am on a BiPap for Apnea.  Without getting into my other sleep issues - just know that this MIGHT work for you.  But it doesn't work for me, a 225 lb elderly male.  It might work for you so I gave it 3 stars.  My daughter claims she wakes up refreshed without brain fog the next day.  I wake up at 1 or 2 in the morning since it only works on me for about 3 to 4 hours.  I hope these bits of info helps you, dear reader, in your purchase decision.

brand: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) Certified Organic Liquid Extract 2x4 oz
name: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) Certified Organic Liquid Extract 2x4 oz
description: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) is a typical species of herbaceous plants of the genus Eschscholzia. The stem is straight or branched, smooth, sometimes bluish in color. The root is rod, powerful. A flower is solitary with yellow to orange petals. California Poppy blooms from February to September. The flower closes at night and in cold windy weather, and opens again in the morning, but may remain closed if it is cloudy weather.
features: California Poppy tincture contains ONLY natural ingredients! | High Quality California Poppy liquid extract - crude extract of first extraction! We meticulously produce our extracts according to precise standards where each herb is extracted according to the distinct characteristic of each plant! | The highest quality California Poppy extract made with love for plants and respect for Nature! | We strictly use only organic or ethically sourced wild harvested material, highest quality alcohol, vegetable glycerin and crystal clear water! Really the BEST California Poppy extract on market!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2013
review_body: I wouldn't buy my tinctures from any other source, they are caring and their quality is top notch, I have tried several other brands and even bought for awhile from a person who makes her own, (not advisable bc of hygenics)...  Hawaii pharm has this down pact!!!From a hopeful, personal point of view...I successfully weaned myself off of opiates with the use of California Poppy..I was taking 4 pills a day for over 8 years!!..I decided to try it on the advice of a local Herbalist who'd owed a store for many years, I tried it, it took a couple weeks to adjust and make allowances for "extra pain" I didn't experience with the opiate, BUT, it is worth giving up more physical activity to not be controlled by a substance that 1) "knocks you out"..2) causes organ damage,sleeplessness, trauma (such as sweats, diareah ,constipation, vomiting if you cannot get it)...It is more like a "whole " body pain relief, not so generalized..and no negative side effects.( and my doctor is on board with it!!)

review_title: Best sleep aid I've ever used.
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2013
review_body: I've used many sleep aids, from melatonin to other over the counter stuff. None compare to just 5-10 drops of california poppy. I typically add it to my night time tea, it has a sweet very tolerable taste. Puts me in a very relaxed mood, I never wake up groggy like other medicines, feels very natural. Unlike melatonin, you don't build up a tolerance to this, atleast I haven't through months of using it nearly every night. I've bought a bottle for my girlfriend and mother and plan to buy more as gifts. Nothing better than a great nights rest.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2012
review_body: I have fibromyalgia and have avoided using pharmaceuticals as much as possible. However, about once a month, my pain is so intense that I need something to break through the pain. I decided to try this since it was touted as a more natural alternative to the codones...and man, has it been a life saver! I just bought some passionflower and st.john's wort in dried form from another source to use as a calming tea at night, since sleep deprivation is one of the biggest issues in my fibromyalgia. I'm excited to see how those will work together. But as far as this product - it truly has been a life-saver and I'm only sorry that I waited so long to order the second bottle!

review_title: After 2 weeks on it I can sleep more than 4 hours.
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2013
review_body: I work 3rd shift and have always been a night person but I have a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep even with Ambian.  I take it 2 times a day not 3  like recomended and I love it it has changed my life.  I'm not exausted all the time, I can think better, I sleep alot more now. I dont have kids,and I work 3rd shift, I have on and off health problems, so there are days I real have nothing I have to do and I have been able to sleep most of the day and evening which is fine with me, my body so can use the rest to heal itself.  And when I have stuff to do I'm not falling asleep tired when I have things to do because I'm sleeping Good when I do sleep.  I highly recomend this to anyone who's mind races when they got to bed. I use to get up and write things and draw scetches of products I should invent that was how fast my mind would race, or thinking I should be doing dishes or laundry or what ever task.  NowI lay down and I couldnt even tell you what my brain is thinking of and off to sleep I go. TRY IT !!

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2015
review_body: I am not a lucid dreamer so can not report on the product's effectiveness if that is your objective. I purchased as a sleep aid, and I am unsure if it helps me to sleep. I do believe that I have better dream recollection when I take it, and that my dreams may be more intense. Alas, as a light sleeper, I sometimes wake from the intensity of a dream, so as a sleep aid it isn't helping, but as an entertainment, it is. As for the taste, I happen to really and truly like the taste. To me it is delicious, almost sweet, and I enjoy allowing the tincture to linger in my mouth for the needed absorption time.

The root is rod, powerful. A flower is solitary with yellow to orange petals. California Poppy blooms from February to September. review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2013
review_body: I've had three lower spine surgeries in the past seven years and still have nerve pain that prevents me from getting a good night's sleep.  I don't want to rely strictly on prescription drugs for the rest of my life, so I tried this.  It doesn't solve all of my problems, but it does help, and I'll continue with it.  P.S. - I use 20 drops of the tincture in water before bed.  Any more and I get VERY sleepy very fast.  If that's your aim, then this might be worth a try.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
review_body: I tried apothecary adaptogens, and decided to give this a try as an alternative. While Apothecary is almost flavorless, this one has much more flavor to it. I use it with limeade or lemonade and soda water, and it gives it a berry flavor, which compliments nicely. Not ideal, if you want to add to something like coffee.I also do feel relaxed after using it. I will be purchasing again.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
review_body: I'm still using my first bottle of Schisandra Berry so I can't say it's making a huge difference yet, but I have a chronic illness so it will take some time and most assuredly more than one bottle. However, I'm very pleased with the integrity of the product, namely being alcohol-free, gluten-free, and preservative-free. Alcohol in a tincture cancels out any benefit you would get from the supplement, so being alcohol-free is VERY important to me because I know I'm not wasting my money. I have a non-celiac gluten intolerance, which means I have, among other things, a compromised digestive system, so being gluten-free and preservative-free means I can rest assured that taking this product will not make me sick. I have had to get used to the taste as it is a little strong, but adding it to some water per the instructions helps. After taking the extract consistently for a little over a week, I'm now used to the taste and have no issue with it. Overall I believe this is a great product and have just recently purchased my second bottle so I don't run out.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2021
review_body: I don’t write a lot of reviews, but if this product can help someone like it helped me, that would be great! A long story short, I have been struggling with menopause, I’m sure a lot of other people are having a really hard time with it like I was, but none of my friends had it that bad. I was having a hot flash every 20 min. All day long. When I wasn’t having a hot flash, I was sweating even when it was cold out! I also was going through major depression, even though I never struggled with depression before! I lost my job because I was so depressed I didn’t get out of bed, I was so sweaty and miserable.. this is terrible to say, but there were days where I thought it would be easier to die! I never ever knew menopause could be so horrible. I looked up stuff everyday that might give me some relief.. I’m not sure if we can mention other products, but I got Menoease, which helped a lot with the hot flashes.. it took about 3 weeks to notice a difference. While looking things up everyday, I read that Schisandra can help with your mood, fatigue and hot flashes.. So I ordered my first bottle and took some as soon as it came.. within 3 days, I felt like a brand new person.. I’m not sure if it’s also helping with the hot flashes since I’m still taking Menoease.. but it is 100 percent helping with the depression and fatigue. I get out of bed every morning now, my mood is Good and I have energy!!! I’m on my second bottle of this Schisandra and I will make sure I never run out! I know every product doesn’t effect everyone the same! But, if you are depressed and always tired.. I would honestly give it a try! I noticed a little difference in just one day.. but in about 3 days I noticed a huge difference! I put two half droppers full in about 2 oz of orange juice every morning!! Hope this helps, no one should have to struggle with menopause or depression!!

review_title: I was really hoping this would work for me.
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2019
review_body: I will start by saying that i think this is a quality product, very much so, that's why i purchased it. Unfortunately i cannot take this product. It bothers my stomach something awful, i mean pains and everything, to the point where i have to be still and/or lay down until the pain passes. This did not happen when i first started taking this product but after some months my body has built up an intolerance to it.I liked it because it was plant based and was a nice variety of B's but i have tried it with food and without.  I will have to go back to Douglas Laboratories® - B-Complex w/ Metafolin because that did not bother me in any way with or without food.  The ONLY reason i switched to this kind is that the other is 25$ and this product is several dollars less. I am very happy to switch back to the other brand i was using, which was prescribed by my acupuncturist.I do not like to give bad reviews and while i think this is a good product there is something in this that i just cannot tolerate, perhaps it's because it's missing the 'intrinsic factor' which i found to be lacking in, which helps my gut/body assimilate the b-vitamins.If you don't have a sensitive stomach and generally don't have a problem tolerating B vitamins go for it, but if you do try looking for a B vitamin that has intrinsic factor in it. Ofcourse do your research, it might help you as it has helped me.

brand: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) and Saint John's Wort (Hypericum Perforatum) Liquid Extract 4x4 oz
name: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) and Saint John's Wort (Hypericum Perforatum) Liquid Extract 4x4 oz
description: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) is a typical species of herbaceous plants of the genus Eschscholzia. The stem is straight or branched, smooth, sometimes bluish in color. The root is rod, powerful. A flower is solitary with yellow to orange petals. California Poppy blooms from February to September. The flower closes at night and in cold windy weather, and opens again in the morning, but may remain closed if it is cloudy weather. Saint John's Wort (Hypericum Perforatum) is a perennial herbaceous plant up to 30 - 100 cm high. The stalk is dihedral bare in the upper part is oppositely branched. Rhizomes and roots are underdeveloped, unbranched. The leaves are oval or ovoid, with translucent glands in the form of black dots. Petals are strewn with black-brown or purple dots, especially around the edge. The plant blooms in June-August.The fruit is a three-celled oblong-ovate capsule. Seeds are small, cylindrical, brown. The fruits ripen in September-October.
features: Crude California Poppy and Saint John's Wort extract of first cold extraction! | California Poppy andextract contains ONLY natural ingredients! | Super concentrated California Poppy and Saint John's Wort extract: dry material / menstruum ratio 1:3! | We strictly use only organic or ethically sourced wild harvested material, highest quality alcohol, vegetable glycerin and crystal clear water! Really the BEST California Poppy and Saint John's Wort extract on market!

brand: Gaia Herbs Black Elderberry - Daily Immune Support Supplement to Help Maintain Well-Being - with Black Elderberries and Acerola Fruit for Antioxidant Support - 60 Vegan Capsules (30-Day Supply)
name: Gaia Herbs Black Elderberry - Daily Immune Support Supplement to Help Maintain Well-Being - with Black Elderberries and Acerola Fruit for Antioxidant Support - 60 Vegan Capsules (30-Day Supply)
description:
Primarily found in Europe and North America, black elderberries have long been used in traditional cultures to support immune function. Elderberry has an extensive history of being used during seasonal immune challenges. Regarded as an “Elder” plant in Native American herbalism, elderberry has been used collectively by many tribes as a tonic medicine and food to promote health and vitality.
Black Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra) is unique in providing both antioxidant and immune support due to its natural concentration of anthocyanins and other flavonoids. This Black Elderberry (Sambucus Nigra) product contains no sweeteners or fillers, and is just as concentrated as our best-selling syrup in the convenience of a capsule for immune system support on the go.
From seed to shelf, Gaia is deeply committed to the purity, integrity, and potency of each product. Since Gaia Herbs was just a seedling in 1987, we have focused on connecting people, plants, and the planet to create healing. We use only organic methods to cultivate more than 6.5 million plants each year. That same organic approach continues throughout our manufacturing. We use patented technology to achieve the highest efficacy of each herb.
We are a company devoted to transparency. We have created Gaia’s MeetYourHerbs platform, one of the world’s first and only herb traceability programs, allowing consumers to learn about and engage with their organic herbs. brand: Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better Organic Supplement, 90 Count
name: Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better Organic Supplement, 90 Count
description:
Enjoy a more restful night's sleep with Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules. Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules combine a powerful 300 mg of verified Non-GMO, Organic Skullcap tops, 250 mg Organic Valerian Root, 100 mg Organic Ashwagandha root, 100 mg Organic Passionflower tops, and 50 mg Organic Hops strobiles (per 2 capsules), to create a powerful, non-habit-forming herbal sleep aid that promotes tranquility, aids in relaxation, and supports a restful night's sleep. 
 Manufactured in Redmond, OR, Oregon's Wild Harvest was proudly founded in 1994 by a registered surgical nurse and farmer with a desire to create natural herbal supplements that give back to the earth through healthy soil, clean water, and the saving of our Non-GMO seeds. 
 Contained in natural bovine gelatin capsules and free of artificial flavors, colors, excipients, or stearates, Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules are also gluten-free and dairy-free, contain no wheat, peanuts, soy, or corn allergens, and have been product verified Non-GMO by SGS, an independent third-party lab. As an herbal supplement, take 2 Sleep Better™ capsules one half-hour before bedtime, or as directed by your health care professional.
features: Promotes healthy, restful sleep | No morning drowsiness | 100% Vegetarian | During the summer months products may arrive warm but Amazon stores and ships products in accordance with manufacturers' recommendations, when provided.

review_title: Healthy, organic, but it keeps me awake!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
review_body: I was really wanting to like this sleep supplement since it’s organic and Family-owned & operated, but the three times I’ve tried it, I was up until 4am with 2 capsules, and 3am with 1 capsule. I tried it on separate days spread out, in case there was something else going on that could have caused this, but the last time I tried it, I took just one capsule, and it still kept me wide awake until 3am. So it’s definitely a surprising reaction. I’ve taken sleep supplements before, but this is the first I’ve tried that has Ashwaganda in it, which I usually take in vitality and energy supplements. But who knows which ingredient is the culprit for me. All I can say for certain is this does not work for everyone, and I was shocked how tired I felt all night, but my mind would not just sleep, which is so much worse than if I wouldn’t have taken this. I just like taking a sleep supplement to help me fall asleep faster, but I don’t have severe sleep issues. I don’t want to rate this product lower than 3 stars, because it does seem to be good quality ingredients, it just didn’t work for me.

brand: Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better Organic Supplement, 90 Count
name: Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better Organic Supplement, 90 Count
description:
Enjoy a more restful night's sleep with Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules. Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules combine a powerful 300 mg of verified Non-GMO, Organic Skullcap tops, 250 mg Organic Valerian Root, 100 mg Organic Ashwagandha root, 100 mg Organic Passionflower tops, and 50 mg Organic Hops strobiles (per 2 capsules), to create a powerful, non-habit-forming herbal sleep aid that promotes tranquility, aids in relaxation, and supports a restful night's sleep. 
 Manufactured in Redmond, OR, Oregon's Wild Harvest was proudly founded in 1994 by a registered surgical nurse and farmer with a desire to create natural herbal supplements that give back to the earth through healthy soil, clean water, and the saving of our Non-GMO seeds. 
 Contained in natural bovine gelatin capsules and free of artificial flavors, colors, excipients, or stearates, Oregon's Wild Harvest Sleep Better™ capsules are also gluten-free and dairy-free, contain no wheat, peanuts, soy, or corn allergens, and have been product verified Non-GMO by SGS, an independent third-party lab. As an herbal supplement, take 2 Sleep Better™ capsules one half-hour before bedtime, or as directed by your health care professional.

review_body: Homeopathic remedies are not regulated and you never really know then what's in them just a caveat for the following.I have used benadryl and THC/CBD products for sleep. review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
review_body: This is one of the few products I've found that actually helps my severe pain. After being force tapered of my stable Rx pain meds, due to the weaponization of the 2016 CDC Guidelines, like thousands of others, I've been searching for something else to help. This doesn't take my severe nerve pain (from broken spinal fusion hardware) away, but it does help reduce it enough that I can actually sleep 2-4 hrs straight. This is one of the strongest brands I've been able to find & after taking it about 2-3 weeks, I increased my dosage upto 3 capsules a day, with Wild Lettuce & Ashwagandha. I've been taking it for several months now & haven't had any adverse side effects.

review_title: FOUR TIMES BETTER THAN ALEVE (220MG) AND HYDROCODONE (325MG) AT A FRACTION OF THE COST
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019
review_body: I recently had two teeth extracted. My dentist gave me a prescription for 15 Hydrocodone 325mg tablets, one tablet every 6 hours for pain. I decided to use the Best Corydalis 1000mg caps instead of the Hydrocodone tabs just to see how effective the tabs would be for my pain.  I decided to take ONE Corydalis cap every 12 hours for pain because of the high 1000mg dosage instead of ONE every 6 hours. Within the first 24 hours, I can honestly say that 110% of all of my tooth extraction pain was gone.  I didn't take anymore Corydalis after the first day. THERE WAS ABSOLUTELY NO SIDE EFFECTS OR DROWSINESS TO REPORT!!!!  Best Corydalis 1000mg is a very, very strong pain reliever at a fraction of the cost compared to other well known pain relievers. Thanks, Bob S., Fremont California 94539

name: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) and Kava Kava (Piper Methysticum) Liquid Extract Tincture 4 Oz (120ml)
description: California Poppy (Eschscholzia Californica) is a typical species of herbaceous plants of the genus Eschscholzia. The stem is straight or branched, smooth, sometimes bluish in color. The root is rod, powerful. A flower is with yellow to orange petals. California Poppy blooms from February to September. The flower closes at night and in cold windy weather, and opens again in the morning, but may remain closed if it is cloudy weather. Kava Kava (Piper Methysticum) is an upright, dioecious, evergreen shrub that grows to 10-15’ tall with glossy dark green leaves. It grows on a number of South Pacific islands (Micronesia, Fiji, Hawaii, New Guinea, the Samoas, Tonga and Vanuatu), but the specific place of origin is unknown. Male plants produce short spikes of small creamy white flowers, but female plants rarely flower.

review_title: Don't use everyday. Otherwise it's excellent!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2017
review_body: If you have liver problems, don't use it as it has Kava Kava. Don't use it every day either. With that said, I have to say that this extract is amazing. I put it into water and it turns into a cloudy white color. The taste isn't bad, but very herbal. Usually within 20 minutes of taking a dose, I feel very tranquil and relaxed and ready for sleep. It is really good for when I have to wake up early the next morning and can't seem to wind down early enough for bedtime. Before, I would lie awake for hours staring at the ceiling until the first sunlight started coming through the window, knowing I'd have to get up in an hour or so. Now when I need it, I can lay down and fall asleep peacefully. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs an occasional herbal sleep aid.

review_body: I've had amazing successes  with kava/poppy. My recent experiences were related to playing solos and juries (end of the semester tests/reviews before the music faculty) during my undergrad education--I majored in music. At this time, my anxiety was just starting to emerge into a problem. I took the recommended dose, on the low side, and found it did wonders to "take the edge off" and allow me to automatically relax my breathing and heart rate and not follow any negative trains of thought. It had a tranquil, peaceful emotional effect as well. But subtle.  One final note, I've noticed a more immediate and profound effect from Sense herbal mix tincture than from taking these herbs earlier in any form separately. Weird. May be this is because they were grown in Hawaii?

review_title: I was a skeptic, but this really works!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2018
review_body: I get seasonal ragweed allergies, BAD! Every year starting in August until the first hard freeze my symptoms are horrible here in Northeast Wisconsin. Itchy & watery eyes, itchy throat & roof of my mouth, sneezing constantly, stuffed up and running nose, congestion.I never had allergies as a kid, but in my late teens to early 20’s I started getting them really bad. I took all of the over the counter meds, Zyrtec, Claritin, you name it. Those products worked, but had side effects. The OTC meds dried out my mouth and sinuses so bad. I would get nosebleeds, be super drowsy or tired. And I have read other bad things about anti-histamines that they can cause dementia after taking them over many years.My father-in-law is a big believer in natural products so he recommended Allerplex to me in combination with Fermented Cod Liver Oil by Blue Ice.I am a skeptical person and thought there was no way something like this could work. I was so wrong. I have read many reviews of this product and some are correct when they say it takes some time to start working. I believe it has to build up in your system to start making a difference. So don’t take two pills and say it doesn’t work. The dosage I read works best is 6-12 daily.I started my regimen August 1st. In Wisconsin this is before ragweed pollen was peaking. I would take 3 Allerplex pills with breakfast and 2 Fermented Cod Liver oil pills by Blue Ice I would repeat that dosage for lunch for the first 2 weeks.I had zero allergy symptoms. Then the ragweed peaked around August 16th with a very high count for a few days. I had slightly itchy eyes in the morning with a sneeze here or there. But nothing major. Had to blow my nose a little more than usual for a few days. So I started taking 3 pills for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and then with a snack in the evening for a few days.My symptoms are gone again. It’s August 21st now, and for the last 3 days, not one sneeze. No itchy eyes, stuffy nose, etc.  Nothing!So I lowered my frequency again only taking 3 Allerplex in the morning and 2 fermented cod liver oil for the last 3-4 days. Still no symptoms.I monitor the pollen count daily. And it is very high for ragweed.I saw my neighbor outside when I got home from work today and she was sneezing. I asked her if it was allergies. She said they were horrible for her right now. And my symptoms are gone! Naturally I had to tell her about Allerplex! So amazing! Standard Process has really changed my life in such a wonderful way. I tell my wife that I have to tell the whole world about this product!Just remember, let this product work through your body for a couple weeks. It may not work overnight. But it has been a game changer for me. I will never by an OTC allergy pill for the rest of my life. No side effects whatsoever! How could you go wrong?One last statistic I read about Allerplex in conjunction with fermented cod liver oil is that this combination works for 95% of people. As bad as my allergies were before Allerplex and as good as I feel now, I truly believe it. Allerplex 6-12 daily, Fermented Cod Liver Oil 3-6 daily. Everyone is different so monitor your body cuz no one knows it better than you. If no symptoms take less. If symptoms are bad take a bit more.

review_title: LIFE CHANGING PRODUCT. NO MORE SUFFERING!!!!!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2014
review_body: This product is a LIFE CHANGER!  I've had allergies my entire life. The past few years they have been so bad that I was in constant pain most of the year. No allergy medicine helped. I had intense pain behind my eyes, severe congestion that lead to daily migraines and jaw/teeth pain.  I went to a chiropractor a few months ago for a non-related issue and discussed my migraines and sever allergies to him. Much to my surprise he was able to literally cure my sinus/allergy issues simply by suggesting I start taking Allerplex.  The bottle says to take 3 per meal. He said I should just take 1 per meal (3x day). Immediately I started seeing and feeling results. I'm now down to ONE Allerplex a day and the chiropractor said I can probably eventually come off them for good because my system should stabilize and not over-react to allergens or even insect bites as drastically as it was.  Even more proof that this supplement works wonders - I got bit on my toe by a fire ant last week - in the past my entire foot would swell up so badly that I couldn't even get a shoe on. Now that I've been using Allerplex, the bit swelled up, but nothing more than like a mosquito bite. It did sting and was irritating for a few days, but, in comparison to how I used to react to one bite, that was minimal!!!!!!!  I can now mow my entire yard and there is no more suffering afterwards. I used to be so allergic to grass, dust, pollen that any time in my yard - especially mowing - would have me sick in bed the entire next day.  As I said, Allerplex is truly a life changer. I cannot thank my chiropractor enough for his recommendation of this product! Seriously, if you have any allergy issues, BUY THIS PRODUCT!  You will be so glad you did!

brand: Standard Process Allerplex - Lung Health Support Supplement - Dietary Supplement with Vitamin A & Pneumotrophin PMG - Support Healthy Mucous Membranes - Supports Seasonal Challenges - 150 Capsules

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2013
review_body: I just came to amazon to buy my second bottle of Alleplex and I thought I might as well leave my two cents on the product too.  I always read reviews before purchasing on Amazon so I thought this might help someone who isn't convinced.  I purchased Congaplex a few years ago when a friend told me to use it for sinus issues...works like a charm when I feel a cold coming on.  I have always had sinus issues and then allergies to pollen/dust etc developed in my late 20's.  My 70 year old father has undergone 3 sinus surgery's in his lifetime (in fact I should buy him a bottle too!).  The reason for the background is that I feel i'm quite experienced when it comes to otc and prescription sinus medication, allergy meds, nasal irrigation, z packs, etc.So about a year ago I bought another bottle of congaplex and on a whim I read the reviews for Allerplex and bought a bottle.  It sat in my cupboard for the past year...I continued on my zyrtec and nasal sprays thinking this stuff really can't battle these springtime allergies.  About 8 weeks ago my nasal congestion was horrible...and I knew the instant my medication wore out...I couldn't breathe...so I got back on the nasal sprays...again I knew exactly when they wore out too.  Finally, I thought what the heck let's try the allerplex.  It really is amazing! no more nasal congestion!!! Funny I usually sneeze about 4 times around 10:30 in the morning and i'm fine the rest of the day. Plus I just read another review before writing this and they described their chronic watery eyes...I've always had that issue...EVERY spring...and completely forgot about it because I've had maybe one morning with watery eyes!  There are no side effects whatsoever.  I take 2 or 3 in the morning and 2 or 3 before bed.  If you have allergies give it a try...if it doesn't work you're out $30 but if it does...you'll be back for more, like me!

review_body: I have bad allergies all the time due to immune system issues. The standard pharmacy meds or allergy shots don’t work for me. Hope this helps you figure out what’s best for you.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2013
review_body: I've used this product for about 10 years to help with allergies that I've had my whole life. I did not want to go the "shot route" for expense and personal reasons and I could not be happier. At the recommendation of my chiropractor, I began using this product to assist in controlling my allergies. It works wonderfully and I feel confident in using it not only for the results but for the fact that it is natural and will not ruin my body like a chemical shot may/may not (don't want to get into politics here). Over the years, I have been able to lessen the doses I have to take and where I used to take many before/during/after mowing the lawn, playing baseball, or petting a cat, now I only have to take a few, if any, to control my symptoms. I don't believe I am growing out of my allergies, but I do believe that this product has helped my body to build up tolerances to the things that agitate my allergies (ragweed, hay, grass, pets, etc.). I now live comfortably with both a dog and cat and enjoy the outdoors when the weather is nice. I keep the Allerplex on hand just in case and have rarely had to use it this season. I find that a larger amount is needed in the begging of the season to help my body acclimate to the change in polen levels, but once that is over, I am usually good to go. Buy this product, it truly works.

review_title: A staple for prevention/reduction of allergies...
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2017
review_body: Might be a placebo, might be real. But my son and I have less allergy attacks than when not taking this supplement. No adverse effects. Just noticeable when we don't take this supplement after a few days (allergies come back: nasal dripping, itchy eyes, scratchy throat, dry cough). It takes about two weeks to notice the difference, but well worth the wait. I have severe allergies to pollen, grass, certain trees (basically the outdoors). And I finally am able to participate in outdoor activities with my kids thanks to this supplement. It's better than allergy meds because there are no apparent adverse effects. I like it! My son truly appreciates it too. He reminds me to re-order when we are almost out. Retailer, maybe you could add this supplement to the subscribe Amazon section???Be patient with this product. It's NOT Zyrtec or clartin. It takes a minimum or two weeks before we noticed a difference. Pricey, but expected with effective nutrition supplements. Ships quickly, well packaged with bubble wrap protection (thank you, I like that the item is intact upon delivery).I love Standard Process as a company. They have excellent quality products/nutritional supplements.

review_body: I love Allerplex!I have 2 dogs, an 8 yr old Cocker Spaniel (Beau), and a 3 yr old Black Mouth Cur (Tank).The Cocker has suffered from severe food allergies since he was born.  Nasty- chronic- yeast- bacteria - ridden ear infections. Tank suffers from seasonal allergies and is allergic to Oak pollen.  He gets bloody raw all over his body and incessant scratching drives the entire family crazy.  After some extensive research I happen to find Allerplex.  Let me tell you that this supplement has done wonders for BOTH of my dogs.  It has helped Beau with his food allergies - no more yucky ears and his skin is cleared up - no more scabs and scratching.  Tank is doing exceptionally better with his seasonal allergies too.  If I stop giving this to my dogs they both go right back to the breakouts and miserable scratching.  I have spent hundreds of $ on Vets for Beaus allergies - ear cleaners - special food etc...  and nothing ever worked.  I was giving Tank & Beau both Benadryl with minimal results.  They were both frequently miserable.  Not anymore!Allerplex is going to be a staple in my house.  I 100% recommend this product!LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!  Not only does it work - but its affordable as well.Finally Something that works!

review_body: Allerplex is composed of natural ingredients, which is why I purchased it.I have just begun taking it as Juniper pollen is already in the air due to earlywarm temps. review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2011
review_body: As a practicing herbalist for many years (for personal use, not as a professional) and an advocate holistic practices I've found that Gaia herbs has always had quality products and I was happy to find this one available here on Subscribe and Save.  My family has been taking both formulas of the Black Elderberry syrup (the standard version and the Nighttime) as a supplements throughout the cold and flu season with excellent results.It's concentrated. You take one teaspoonful once a day, twice only if needed. I've found that it's not overly sedative which is a plus.  It has something of a mild relaxing effect keeping in mind that your mileage may vary.  The potency of the formula is focused in the immunity support that the Black Elderberries provide. It's manufactured in Italy where it's a traditional medicine with these additional organic ingredients:  Acerola, California Poppy, Lemon Balm, Grindelia, Sugar Cane (4g of sugar per serving), water, and Lemon Juice. I've come to really like this product and will be sure to keep a bottle of each formula on hand all year round, so I recommend it highly.

review_title: Very Helpful for Nighttime Cough and Immune Boost
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2015
review_body: My children were hit with a serious cold/flu thanks to flu vaccinated grandparents "shedding". I know this was the source because I homeschool and my children don't go to daycare. My parents went to the doctor to get antibiotics but my children were given Black Elderberry Syrup, Black Elderberry NightTime Syrup, vitamins, tea (lemon, honey and a little salt) and a small spoonful of diced garlic and honey. My children recovered within two weeks (that's how nasty the bug was) my parents were sick for nearly a month with the cough lingering even longer.I used this product sparingly at night to give relief from the nasty cough and put an oil diffuser in their room to help with nasal congestion.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
review_body: I had been using another citrus bergamot extract for well over three years, Of late, however, that product seemed to be losing its potency and benefits for me. After extensive and very careful (i.e., which I do for any supplement I purchase online), I decided to try this Toplus Nutrition version of the product. My primary reasons for selection this product are: (1) excellent customer reviews, (2) higher quality of ingredients than the product I previously was using, (3) addition of Bioperine which aids digestion and absorption into my system (i.e., which my prior product did NOT have), (4) better value (i.e., which is very important to me because I am a retired senior living on a very tight fixed income, and (5) last, but certainly not least, the Toplus product is "Made in America" (i.e., which is of paramount importance to me because it helps to ensure quality manufacturing and ingredients. So far, the Toplus product seems to be working well for me and I plan to reorder the product when I need to. Yes, I very much recommend this products.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
review_body: We are all adults here (or should be) so let me tell you about my experience.I have had a fatty liver for years, verified everytime I get a CT Scan on my kidneys because of kidney stones (if you are unfamiliar with them, God Bless because they are the absolute worst pain, imagine sticking an umbrella in your Johnson and opening it)the doctor freaks out when I get blood work done because of my triglycerides because they are 239 (down from 2200 after I got out of the military) and tells me that I need to bring them down to under 150 (come on man! They used to be over 2200!).One of the signs of a fatty liver is floating yellow poo (now you know) which I had for years.I was researching natural cures for a fatty liver and ran across Bergamot, ordered a bottle and what a difference! (even though I am taking only 2 of the 3 tablets it recommends) No more floaters and back to a brown color.I had tried taking Milk Thistle extract but would get cramps from it and it didn't do away with the floaters, Citrus Bergamot did and I could see the difference in just a few weeks.I have labs again in a few weeks and will find out if it is lowering the triglycerides.

I would say if you are dealing with pain give this a try.

review_body: I have gout. It's been a couple weeks since I've been able to walk comfortably.  I took two pills last night at 10PM and although my feet are a little bit sensitive I can walk almost normally right now.  I have been doing other things also to alleviate my gout (I drank about half a gallon of water last night, plus took pain meds, but by now the pain meds must have worn off).  I like that the pills don't have a picture of a hemp plant, would be hard to explain in my anti-drug home.  Anyway yes it seems to be working great. Thank you. :)

review_title: Doesn't MAKE me sleep but helps me sleep and dream...
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
review_body: I have joint pain and take a prescription medication that interferes with brain waves and sleep. Plus, I do part-time shift work which requires EARLY mornings. It was getting to the point that I could only sleep 4 hours at a time, plus still wake up in pain to drag around exhausted continuously no matter what I tried. I only take a capsule if I'm not working the next morning lest I oversleep. The capsules don't drug me to sleep but do let me relax and drift off. Also, I am aware that I dream more and get better quality sleep. I wake up feeling refreshed and able to accomplish the day's goals. I didn't get an okay from my doctor before trying these, but used myself as a guinea pig. I am not one bit sorry about that though I'm not advocating everyone do the same. Still, these seem gentle in their effect. I am happy I found them (did so because I'm a tea lover and saw this ingredient in multiple sleep teas). I intend to keep using them-- it's like multiple cups of sleep tea without all the liquid so I don't have to make bathroom trips in the middle of the night! LOL

review_body: I really loved these are first - I was sleeping so much better, and not experiencing the nighttime anxiety and racing thoughts that I usually do. review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2013
review_body: I use this for sleep. Sleep medications do not really do well with me. So I tried this out along with the other sleep supplements I take. I have to say it seems to help, I read another review where they say if they do wake in middle of night to take a little more, I have done that and am able to get back to sleep much better then before I was using. My sleep has been a bit deeper too, normally I am such a light sleeper and would wake up every hour on the hour, now I can at least for 4 or more hours before waking. I highly recommend trying this for sleep problems, it was worth trying for me.

features: Herbs Etc - Deep Sleep 4 oz
review_title: I've used this product in years past with good results. I originally purchased it at Whole Foods
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2014
review_body: I've used this product in years past with good results. I originally purchased it at Whole Foods, and had the unique experience of speaking with the product's formulator, who actually created it for his wife's menopausal insomnia and chattery "Monkey Brain". I was having the same symptoms, and still do. I don't use this every night, but when I have spurts of insomnia, I turn to it every time, and it works. Yes, it does not have the most pleasant flavor, but I combine it with Sweet Dreams tea before bed, and then the taste is not bad at all.

brand: Deep Sleep - Natural Herbal Sleep Aid Supplement - Non-Habit Forming - 4 oz Liquid Extract (Contains Fresh Extracts of California Poppy, Valerian, Passionflower, Chamomile, Lemon Balm
name: Deep Sleep - Natural Herbal Sleep Aid Supplement - Non-Habit Forming - 4 oz Liquid Extract (Contains Fresh Extracts of California Poppy, Valerian, Passionflower, Chamomile, Lemon Balm
description: Deep Sleep is made with sleep promoting herbs, including Passionflower, Chamomile and Lemon Balm.
features: Herbs Etc - Deep Sleep 4 oz
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2013
review_body: I have had problems with waking up early. Deep Sleep addresses this some but by itself is not effective for me in that I wake up early still but maybe an hour later than I have (after I have become tolerant to other prescription meds I have been trying.)  If you try it, know that the first couple nights will be very strange, with crazy dreams - this is the best I can describe it. But at least this is not an additive medication. I have since added back the other prescriptions meds one by one and Deep Sleep does seem to potentiate their effect. I have reordered another value-size four ounce bottle from Amazon. It is not the alcohol-free version but that does not bother me and Herbs Etc tells me that the amount of alcohol in the whole bottle does not equal a half glass of wine, if I remember correctly. You might want to check with them directly to be sure, if that is an issue for you.

brand: Deep Sleep - Natural Herbal Sleep Aid Supplement - Non-Habit Forming - 4 oz Liquid Extract (Contains Fresh Extracts of California Poppy, Valerian, Passionflower, Chamomile, Lemon Balm
name: Deep Sleep - Natural Herbal Sleep Aid Supplement - Non-Habit Forming - 4 oz Liquid Extract (Contains Fresh Extracts of California Poppy, Valerian, Passionflower, Chamomile, Lemon Balm
description: Deep Sleep is made with sleep promoting herbs, including Passionflower, Chamomile and Lemon Balm.
features: Herbs Etc - Deep Sleep 4 oz
review_title: IT TASTES LIKE TARNISHED SILVER BUT WORKS LIKE MAGIC !!
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2014
review_body: I've written a positve review before on the soft gels, so I thought I'd give the liquid a try, as I also thought it might be more cost effective.NEVER AGAIN !While it has the same potency as the gels, it has the most god-awful taste, akin to licking the inside of tarnished spoon...which I did as a kid and remember vividly.The stopper didn't work well either, not completely filling to the maximum, but only about half-way. I took two of these droppers half-full and slept soundly. Doing so seems to use a greater amount than in the gels, obviously, to achieve the same effect of three gels.Once I'm finished with this review, and even though I have an almost full 4oz bottle left, I'm ordering the gels again. Less mess, no aftertaste, no burping it up to haunt you three hours later, and a better value.PLEEEASE, Herbs Etc., at least add a little pina colada taste to it to make it more palatable.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
review_body: I started taking these about a year ago because my wife was concerned about my short term memory.  I had tried over the counter products that did not help.  My wife, being a research scientist, found these and checked them out.  She could tell a difference in me within a week, and so could I.  I became a subscriber and will continue with them. I have made taking my two gummies part of my start the day routine.  Try them, you will feel a difference and the bonus is they actually taste good!

brand: Ashwagandha & Lion's Mane Supplement Gummies - Comprehensive Mushroom Supplement for Cognitive & Immune Support, Vegan Blend with Reishi, Cordyceps - Low Carb, 80 Organic Mushroom Gummies

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2024
review_body: Previously, I had been using the Sugar Free Mushroom Gummies/Gushrooms and the Tinies bears Gummies. Both of those tasted great without being too sweet (the Gushrooms were a nice strawberry flavor, while the Tinies bears were blueberry).But I noticed that the Tinies bears Gummies were a little bit chewier than the Gushrooms. The Gushrooms were on the softer side of a gummy: softer than a Haribo gummy bear, but not quite as soft as an Alban gummy bear.These gummies by Drops of Nature are great, too. There is a mix of different flavors to pick from in the pouch, and they all taste great.I would have continued getting the Gushrooms, but you seem to get more gummies in the pouch by Drops of Nature than with the Gushrooms. In the end, the price and value was the winning factor for me.

brand: Ashwagandha & Lion's Mane Supplement Gummies - Comprehensive Mushroom Supplement for Cognitive & Immune Support, Vegan Blend with Reishi, Cordyceps - Low Carb, 80 Organic Mushroom Gummies
name: Ashwagandha & Lion's Mane Supplement Gummies - Comprehensive Mushroom Supplement for Cognitive & Immune Support, Vegan Blend with Reishi, Cordyceps - Low Carb, 80 Organic Mushroom Gummies
features: Advanced Mushroom Blend: Includes Chaga, Maitake, Turkey Tail, Shiitake, Reishi, and Cordyceps; enhanced with lions mane and ashwagandha; supports immunity, overall health and wellness; promotes mental clarity & focus with traditional medicinal mushrooms | Carefully Crafted Gummies: Designed to ensure purity, safety and effectiveness; made with high-quality ingredients; crafted under strict manufacturing processes; supports immune & mental performance; provides reliable supplementation for seasonal wellness | Immune Defense Support: Can serve as an effective immune booster; helps maintain strong and healthy body; formulated with a blend of mushrooms and ashwagandha known for immune-supporting properties; ideal for maintaining resilience during seasonal changes | Vegan-Friendly Formula: Non-GMO and gluten-free pectin-based gummies; contain organic ingredients; suitable for vegan diets and plant-based preferences; made with natural ingredients without artificial additives or preservatives | Delicious Berry Flavor: Offers a natural mixed fruit berry flavor; makes daily supplementation enjoyable; convenient and tasty way to incorporate mushrooms and ashwagandha into your routine; enhances wellness journey with great taste and vital nutrients
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
review_body: Alright, so I gotta spill the beans on these Ashwagandha & Lion's Mane Supplement Gummies—spoiler alert: they're pretty darn interesting!First off, let's talk benefits. Now, I'm no scientist, but I swear these little guys did something good for my brain. My focus felt sharper, especially on those crazy busy days when my to-do list was longer than a CVS receipt. Lion's Mane is supposed to be the brain's best friend, and coupled with the chill vibes from Ashwagandha, it's like a match made in gummy heaven.But wait, there's more! They're not just for the brainiacs out there. Some days, I swear they helped with my memory, giving me that extra edge when I needed to remember where I left my keys or the name of that movie from the '90s.And let's not forget about sleep quality. These gummies didn't exactly knock me out like a horse tranquilizer, but I did notice I slept a bit more soundly on the nights I took them. Maybe it's the Reishi mushroom doing its thing—I don't know, but I'll take it!Oh, and mood? Yeah, they get a gold star for that too. I felt like I had a little pep in my step, even on those gloomy Mondays when the coffee just wasn't cutting it.Now, let's address the elephant in the room—smell. Okay, I won't lie, when you first open the bottle, there's a bit of a funky mushroom smell. But don't let that scare you off! Once you pop one in your mouth, it's all sweet, fruity goodness.And did I mention they're gummies? Yeah, you heard that right. No pills to swallow here—just delicious, chewy goodness. Plus, they're low carb, so you can indulge without feeling guilty about it.Now, don't get me wrong, these gummies aren't some magic cure-all. Some days, I felt like Wonder Woman after taking them, and other days, not so much. But hey, they're just one piece of the puzzle when it comes to feeling your best.When I started to take these it gave me a minor headache (could be possible side effects).Overall, if you're looking for a fun and tasty way to give your brain, memory, sleep quality, mood, and energy a little boost, these gummies might just be worth a shot!

brand: Gaia Herbs, Lions Mane Mushroom, 40 Count
name: Gaia Herbs, Lions Mane Mushroom, 40 Count

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2024
review_body: I take B vitamins,  D3 and probiotic every day and have for a while to try and stay healthy and have energy. I think they help minimally but nothing super noticeable. I have tried those greens powders and could not notice any difference. I will try to post an update as I have only been taking for a few days but I can honestly say I think this is a game changer for me. I noticed a difference ever since the first day. As many others have stated I found I can only take 1 of these and it needs to be very early in the morning like by 7:30/8am. The first day I took it at 10:30am and then forgot I took it. Later in the afternoon I noticed I was not feeling sluggish at all and actually the opposite then it dawned on me I had take this supplement. I was not able to sleep well that night just wide awake and mind buzzing. I took it early in the morning the next 2 days and sleep was better. I am going to take a break from it over the weekend and see if I feel any different. Also I will add that I am neurodivergent (I don't take medication for this) and I honestly feel like it helping me be more focused and actually able to complete tasks instead of having decision fatigue. I have been very productive the last few days and very good mood. I do get seasonal depression and the daylight is quickly fading here plus it has been overcast and rainy for several days now so normally I would be very lazy and no energy but that has not been the case since taking this supplement. So far I am incredibly impressed. I have always thought I had some hormonal imbalances or something making me have lower energy and the past year I have put on weight that's been very difficult to lose (once I hit 30 it really hit). I am really hoping that continuing this supplement will help keep me more active and being able to complete more projects and tasks which I normally struggle with. I'm also hoping with the increased energy it will help me lose the weight I have gained over the last year. I'll try to post an update in a few weeks but I definitely recommend giving this a try, so far I really like it! I think I actually could use a lower dose. I am curious to see long term if its something your body gets used to and you need more to be as effective or not.

review_body: This product is amazing, but be careful, I usually have high blood pressure and this supplement significantly lowers it, to the point where I took too many of them and I thought I needed to go to the hospital. I later realized what saved me is that before I went to the hospital I drank a cup of coffee offsetting the negative effects. So I used this before a soccer game prior to the hospital incident and was running around nonstop and had plenty of energy and mental clarity. So just becareful how much of it you take I only take 1/4 of a capsule now into my water just to make sure I don't get a repeat of what happened.

review_title: Helped improve my stamina and reduce fatigue.  Pretty cool, subtle results
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2018
review_body: I have used this product for about two weeks with subtle but good results. I take one capsule in the morning and on a few occasions I took a second capsule in the evening.  I have not tried two capsules at once and I’ll explain why further down.  For an understanding of my physiology and health, I eat very healthy (close to a paleo diet with a few changes) and I’m very active.  I take creatine and not on any health medication.  I also work and in school.This supplement has a subtle effect on me.  This does not have a strong or immediately noticeable result once taken.  However, I did notice an increase in stamina and less fatigue when I was doing fast, high incline, hiking (I would say results felt similar to creatine but much less effective).  I also felt it helped me feel less fatigued on a few days when I was getting less than my normal amount of sleep.  I would like to try this stuff on a night shift rotation but I haven’t had the chance yet.It is important to remember everyone’s physiology is different and other factors like diet and health will impact how a supplement will work for different people.  Not everyone is going to get the same result and that is not necessarily the fault of the product (or the person).  For me, I noticed a mild improvement in the stamina and reduced fatigue, but I didn’t notice until taking it for a few days.  I’m not sure if you need to build this up in the system for a few days for effectiveness but I’m trying to test that now and will update later if I have anything to add.I would caution that if you have a weak or sensitive stomach you should be cautious with Rhodiola Rosea Extract.  It doesn’t have a pleasant taste and even though it is in capsule form, it caused a little stomach gas for me on a few occasions and I could smell / taste it which is not pleasant. For this reason I never wanted to take more than one pill at a time.  I didn’t have this experience every time, but it happened at least half the time, on an empty stomach or with a meal.  Having said that, it is not terrible either and I would argue if you are burning the candle at both ends, this may be effective in helping you balance out.  I don’t feel I need this daily but would use building up for finals or as needed.Also, I did not notice cognitive benefits while taking this and studying.

review_title: High-salidroside Rhodiola rosea inhibits bladder cancer and more?
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
review_body: According to one study, high-salidroside Rhodiola rosea inhibits bladder cancer as well as others: "Rhodiola rosea L.: an herb with anti-stress, anti-aging, and immunostimulating properties for cancer chemoprevention".As well as a lot of other stuff, "Anti-Inflammatory and Neuroprotective Effects of Constituents Isolated from Rhodiola rosea", and "Salidroside promotes peripheral nerve regeneration based on tissue engineering strategy using Schwann cells and PLGA: in vitro and in vivo".It's important to know what you're getting because R. rosea can vary in content between rosavins and salidroside wildly, with Chinese R. crenulata having only rosavins, yet these also have their positives despite an early estrogenic effect: "Rhodiola crenulata induces an early estrogenic response and reduces proliferation and tumorsphere formation over time in MCF7 breast cancer cells".Doublewood's formula tells you exactly what you're getting, and it works for me because it's anti-fatigue for someone with fibro--not as a "stimulant"--it's anti-cancer, and it generates nerve growth in the memory-and-learning hippocampus.With all adaptogens, you should take them for a month to get the full effect, particularly with increases in memory.  However, as a serotonin promoter, R. rosea shouldn't be taken with SSRIs, 5-htp, or L-theanine, because excessive serotonin can cause "serotonin syndrome", the effects of which are the opposite of what you want out of it, such as insomnia.  It also lowers blood pressure, a positive for some but not all, and slightly increases heart rate; however, huperzine A (a promoter of acetylcholine) does the opposite.  I take a small amount of it along with Rhodiola once a day.Am I happy with Double Wood's creation?  Love it!

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
review_body: My doctor suggested this sleep aide to me because I am in the throws of menopause and I was waking up every night, sometimes several times, and I would feel very unrestful and would toss and turn to go back to sleep.  I just was not getting a full, rested night of sleep.  I'm huge on using natural products like the essential oils in this product  (for example, I don't use hormone treatment -- I take maca supplements).  So I researched this stuff and decided to go for it.  I started with 1 pill and it helped.  My magic number is now 2.  I like that I don't feel groggy, I feel rested.  I have occasionally woken up but I fall right back to sleep -- I'm not tossing and turning every night.  So happy that my doctor suggested this to me.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2011
review_body: This product is an intelligent combination of melatonin, l-theanine and 6 herbs. All of the herbal ingredients act in a similar way to benzodiazepines (influencing GABA). Most of the herbs can be used by themselves for insomnia; I find this combination to be much more sleep inducing than any single herb (having tried them all). You wake in the morning feeling refreshed without any Rx "hangover". I highly recommend Sleep Aide.

review_body: It was recommended to me. I was skeptical.  I have had insomnia for years. I have Tried everything in the book. Acupuncture, teas, drops, melatonin, whiskey (not recommended). I recommend to check with your physician if you are under care. I like it because it is all natural.

review_body: This is a really potent tincture. I was doubtful that it would be, until I could barely get up the next morning. review_title: Excellent brand and product – and a warning
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024
review_body: First – "Wild & Organic" is an excellent brand and my review is in no way about the company or their products (which is why I still gave 5 stars.)Second – a friendly warning – natural herbal remedies can be very powerful. Just one drop of this passionflower tincture, and I experienced severe headache, nausea, red face, sweating and stomach upset.However this is me... everyone is different. My advice with any herbal remedy would be "start low and slow" – try one drop the first dose and see what happens.Absolutely nothing wrong with this product. I'm only sharing my reaction because most people don't realize how powerful natural herbal remedies can be.

description: Min-Chex is a combination of minerals and synergistic factors designed to support the nervous system. Since 1929, Standard Process has been the visionary leader in whole food nutrient solutions. We apply systems thinking to holistic nutrition that empowers practitioners to transform lives. Dedicated to the whole food philosophy of our founder, Dr. Royal Lee, our goal is to carry on his mission to provide nutrients for the body that are as close as possible to how they are found in nature. Our products include foods that are prepared in a way that safeguards their nutritional value. The majority of these ingredients are grown locally on our certified organic farm and may require chopping, dicing, juicing and/or drying for use in our products. These highly complex combinations contain a variety of elements designed to trigger trophic effects that support the body’s healthy balance and wellness.

Min Chex has helped me with #1 and #3 enough to pay $36 a month.  I only take 1 in the morning and rarely a second.  I understand in time a may need more so I am trying not to rush it.  My husband takes as well and he is doing much better, alert and focused.  He is too cheap to waste money so if he wants to buy it then it is helpful.

review_body: These really help balance me out. My life right now is extremely busy and I easily get overwhelmed and feel bombarded often between work and everyday life. These help me stay focused at work so that I can get tasks done. Normally, I tend to get overwhelmed by everything I have going on and it hinders me from marking things off my to-do list. They really help me stay from going off the deep end! I also thing they help me sleep better. I take 3 a day, morning, noon and late afternoon/evening. Give it a try- it's worth the money.

brand: Herb Pharm Herbs on The Go Portable Spray, Bed Time 1 Fl Oz
name: Herb Pharm Herbs on The Go Portable Spray, Bed Time 1 Fl Oz
description: Herbs on the Go: Bed Time works with the body's natural mechanisms to promote a quiet, calm and restful sleep while providing soothing support for the nervous system. Expertly formulated with California Poppy, Ziziphus, Lemon Balm, Passionflower, Chamomile, Lavender and Cardamom—the spray is designed to be easy-to-use and rapidly absorbed. Crafted with taste in mind, it has sweet and pleasantly floral flavors. Herb Pharm never uses synthetic solvents. The company's farm is Certified Organic, Bee Friendly, and Salmon Safe. Herb Pharm is the #1 selling liquid herbal extract brand in US Natural Food (SPINS). Herb Pharm is a company of herbalists, scientists, and farmers in GMO-free Josephine County, OR. There, they have been cultivating herbs with care, precision, and respect for nature since 1979.
features: Promotes a quiet, calm and restful sleep, and provides soothing support for the nervous system. | Intuitive format makes it easier to include herbs in your healthy everyday habits. | It's sweet and pleasantly floral flavors engage your pre-digestive senses and helps your body recognize and use herbs. | Includes sweet California Poppy glycerite prepared from whole Eschscholzia californica plants (root, leaf & flower) which are Certified Organically Grown on Herb Pharm's own farm. The plants are hand-harvested while in full flower, then milled at the last moment before extraction. | This statement has not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
review_title: The best sleep aid I've ever used
review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2024
review_body: My acupuncturist recommended this blend, and I was worried it might leave me "hungover" in the morning, because I tend to be very sensitive to such things, but it doesn't at all! I'm in a stressful season of life and was having a hard time sleeping more than 4-5 hours a night, so I would feel really "crunchy" during the day, and then wired-tired at night. This spray has not only helped me look forward to good sleep every night, it has also "softened" my nervous system so even when I'm light on sleep (due to external circumstances now rather than internal ones) I don't get that crunchy feeling. I keep it next to my bed and take it nightly (along with magnesium glycinate). It tastes great! Like cardamom.

review_location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024
review_body: Everything in relation to your health is about chemistry. What works for one person doesn't work for another. Everything you ingest from drinks, food or medications it's all chemistry. I tried all kinds of herbals and prescription medications and nothing works without side effects. I get incredibly sick from Melatonin and other things I tried leave me feeling groggy or with a terrible migraine. I have a very sensitive system.I'm happy I found this because it works with my chemistry. One negative about it for me is bothers my throat a little. I wish it wasn't made with alcohol but maybe the herbs chemistry work better by being extracted with alcohol.The final result is ....I slept like a baby!
